title: Help Out the Los Angeles Bicycle Academy
content:
Help Sustain the Wheels of Change at LABA!

Los Angeles Bicycle Academy (L.A.B.A) is a youth bicycle education and safety program, community bike shop and cycling race team with a mission to empower, educate and develop entrepreneurial and leadership skills in youth. The success of our organization is contingent upon generous supporters who have a passion for bettering the lives of underserved youth through the sport of cycling.

LABA needs your help. Read on for their SOS belowâ€¦

Regrettably, we recently experienced a significant setback in our mission to empower and transform lives through cycling. A major sponsor, who had initially committed to a three-year partnership, has had to withdraw their support unexpectedly. This sudden loss of funding has left us in a precarious position, jeopardizing the programs and opportunities we provide to our youth and community.

The impact of this unexpected turn of events cannot be overstated. Los Angeles Bicycle Academy has been an agent of hope and positive change for countless youth, offering not just the joy of cycling but also valuable life skills, mentorship, racing opportunities, skill development, and a sense of community. Now, we find ourselves at a crossroads, facing the imminent threat of reduced services and, ultimately, the potential closure of vital programs that are touching so many lives.

This is where your support becomes paramount! We are reaching out to our community, friends, and champions of our cause, asking for your help to bridge the financial gap. Your generous contribution will not only keep the wheels turning at Los Angeles Bicycle Academy but will also ensure that the positive impact on the youth we serve continues unabated.

In these challenging times, your support is a lifeline for us. All donations are tax deductible and any assistance is greatly appreciated. Together, we can overcome this obstacle and continue making a lasting impact on the lives of those we serve. Thank you for being a vital part of our mission ðŸ’™
